title: Broccoli Cheese Soup 🍵 || Creamy Soup || Winter Treat ❄️
content:
Soup recipe: Broccoli Cheese Soup 🍵 Servings : 2 Duration : 1/2 an hr Soup is creamy liquid substance which can be made by combining many ingredients such as with milk, vegetables, sauce, cheese, salt , pepper & ginger- garlic these are ingredients are used to make any kind of soup, but varies from one to other cuisine. Winter is the comfort season to have warm / hot soup and snacks. This is the season to enjoy hot cup of soup in cold winter at evening time 😊 So I started winter treats to share hot soup and snacks. They are many soup varieties but today I prepared a famous and delicious soup which is Broccoli Cheese Soup have creamy and cheesy soup. Nutrition facts: Broccoli: Vitamins A,C & B6. Minerals calcium, iron, magnesium, protein, fiber & potassium Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Broccoli Florets - 15
  • Milk - 235 ml
  • Vegetable stock / Water - 235 ml
  • All purpose flour - 1 tb sp
  • Unsalted Butter - 2 tb sp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Fine black pepper powder - 1 tsp
  • Mozzarella Cheese - 100 gms
Procedure: Prepreparation: Blanch Broccoli
  • In a bowl / pan add 1/2 Ltr water, let it boil
  • Add washed & chopped broccoli florets
  • Let them cook for 5 mins
  • Strain water
  • Cook until crisp & tender
  • Broccoli cooked, keep it aside
[caption id="attachment_7665" align="alignnone" width="1020"] Blanched Broccoli[/caption] Process of making Broccoli Cheese Soup 🍵:
  • Heat sauce pan over low to medium heat
  • Add butter let it melt
  • Add all purpose flour & mix well
  • Cook 1 min
  • Add vegetable stock/ water & milk
  • Stir & Let it boil
  • Reduce heat & add mozzarella cheese ,salt & pepper powder
  • Mix well
  • Cook more 10 mins, so cheese melts and combines with milk
  • Finally add blanched broccoli & mix well
  • Stir continuously
  • Cook more 10 mins
  • Broccoli Cheese soup is ready to serve
  • Serve hot/ immediately
  • Enjoy your day & Happy cooking 🙂
Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • I haven't added salt While blanching broccoli if you would like to add 1/2 tsp of salt
  • Cheese makes your soup Creamy & heavy texture
  • Instead of mozzarella cheese, You can also use cheddar cheese/ Parmesan cheese
  • Adjust spices according to taste
  • Double the ingredients if you are preparing more quantity
  • Cheese contains high calories..You can easily avoid Cheese in soup... without cheese also it goes well
